name: The site of rising Arun!
body:
### Welcome to Arun's website.
Yes, Arun means the sun, hence the name of the page. But it hasn't risen yet. Please come back later.

![Under Construction](http://img09.deviantart.net/ecaa/i/2008/059/5/8/under_construction_by_creamania.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
